title: Navigate to an unchecked checkbox
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.

title: Navigate to a checked checkbox
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.

title: Operate a checkbox
instructions: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Read an unchecked checkbox
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox

title: Read a checked checkbox
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox
instructions: When focus is on a checkbox, read its grouping information

title: Navigate sequentially through a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate both forward and backward into and out of  the checkbox group.

title: Navigate into a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group
instructions: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
